question: [File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Consensus.AEDPoS/Types/NextRoundInput.cs] [Function: Create()] [Null Reference] If a null Round object is passed to Create(), does the method throw NullReferenceException when accessing round.RoundNumber, allowing DOS of consensus transition generation?
